version_description:
While we did kick out a few bugs and enhanced the gameplay, get ready for the ultimate robot fighting experience with awesome new features added to the game:

FORGE THE ULTIMATE ALLIANCE
Now, join forces with other players from across the globe and create an unstoppable Alliance of Steel Warriors. Chat and discuss match-winning strategies with other Alliance members. Top the Alliance Leaderboards and bag huge rewards.

INTRODUCING THE WRB2 GAME PASS
Claim the new WRB2 Game Pass and come back every day to accomplish Season challenges and get access to bonus rewards across the entire Season.

AWESOME NEW ANIMATIONS
Immerse into the best steel crushing action and elevate your fighting experience with 10 awesome new Rip-off moves to KO your opponents.

BUG FIXES & OPTIMIZATIONS
While you've been busy dominating opponents, we kicked a few bugs out of the game. Few adjustments were done for smoother and effortless gameplay experience.

HOLIDAY UPDATE
With the Holiday season just around the corner, get ready for plenty of fantastic fun coming this Fall bringing in the opportunity to claim the awesome robots!
Brace yourselves for amazing events as your thumbs twiddle for crazy action. Bug Fixes and Optimizations were done in the game for a smoother, effortless, and flawless gameplay experience. So, upgrade your ultimate war-machine, and dive into the fun...
